thread.title: Watch Dan Harmon React to Community Porn Parody
thread.title_full: Watch Dan Harmon React to the Community Porn Parody | Maxim

author: Ellen Killoran
title: Watch Dan Harmon React to Community Porn Parody
text:
Dan Harmon, Community 's once-disgraced but since redeemed original showrunner, treated himself (and us) to a trip down uncomfortable memory lane when he live-tweeted Hustler's porn parody of his sitcom, This Ain't Community XXX (link seriously NSFW), which first surfaced on Reddit in 2013.
The production value of the porn parody seems to match the level of effort put into titling it. Nonetheless, Harmon was amused by the inconsistency of the parody's relationship to its source material , and impressed by the appearance of true-blue porn industry veterans.
m HERSCHEL SAVAGE is in the Community porn and I think he's Pierce but I don't know because everything is awesomely confusing
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 Pierce Shirley scene. But it's a dream too? It's like Community XXX is going out of its way to be less accessible than Gang Bang Theory
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 OH MY GOD Herschel Savage just pronounced Abed's name wrong like Chevy but NOT THE SAME WRONG WAY AS CHEVY
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 Ultimately, Harmon is pleased as punch that This Ain't Community XXX exists.
OH MY GOD Herschel Savage just pronounced Abed's name wrong like Chevy but NOT THE SAME WRONG WAY AS CHEVY
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 OH MY GOD Herschel Savage just pronounced Abed's name wrong like Chevy but NOT THE SAME WRONG WAY AS CHEVY
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 Okay it's over. That was me live tweeting a porn parody of a TV show I created. I feel very seriously complete now. Not in that way.
— Dan Harmon (@danharmon) October 17, 2015 h/t A.V. Club
